GitLab CI Coordinator URL: https://gitlab.com GitLab CI Token: xxxï¼ˆä»é¡¹ç›®ä¸­å¤åˆ¶ï¼‰ Tags: my-tag,another-tagï¼ˆè‡ªå®šä¹‰ï¼‰ Description: my-runnerï¼ˆè‡ªå®šä¹‰ï¼‰ Executor: shellï¼ˆMac ä¸Šå»ºè®®é€‰æ‹© shellï¼‰

ä¸‰ã€ç¼–å†™ .gitlab-ci.yml æ–‡ä»¶å¹¶æäº¤å°†ä»¥ä¸‹å†…å®¹ä¿å­˜ä¸º .gitlab-ci.ymlï¼Œå¹¶ push åˆ° GitLabï¼š stages: - deploydeploy_to_test: stage: deploy script: - yarn - rm -rf dist/ - yarn build - ls -l -t ./dist/ - rsync -avz ./dist/ root@xxx.xx.xx.xxx:/dist
